heading: Diablo 4 Season 3 Compendium â€“ Season Launch Updates & New Guides
content: Diablo 4 Season 3 is almost here and the team is excited to release our absolutely massive Season 3 Compendium. It has a ton of Leveling and End Game Build updates containing the new along with the new . We'll be rapidly testing and learning a lot about the state of many classes alongside everyone else, and have a lot of updates planned throughout the Season. except our Nightmare Dungeon Tier List have been updated. The Nightmare Dungeon Tier List will be updated once our team has run them, with the new changes coming to some of them. Measure twice and cut once, right? You can use our search bar to find any Aspect, Unique, Side Quests, Dungeon or other Resource. So many things to talk about! Let's dive in and see everything on offer for Season 3! Don't know what playstyle you're looking for? See the lists below to choose your class and embark on an adventure. They are great in helping assistance you along the way. We'll be testing these builds and making adjustments where required, along with creating new builds throughout the Season! It wouldn't be a Season 3 Compendium update without Tier List updates! Tier Lists are a great way to see how different builds and classes stack up against each other in various parts of the game. The Endgame Build Tier List is particularly good at finding a good build for all activities, including Nightmare Dungeons. With the new Season comes new Season specific guides. Many of these will be expanded on once the Season goes live, and we can see the full Battle Pass and Journey, etc. The Season brings with it a whole new set of Nightmare Dungeons, A quick last note on ! We have consolidated all (regardless of source) into ONE guide and properly show each one, source, and where to get it from! The Gauntlet (along with Leaderboards) are coming soon after the release of Season 3! They are a weekly test of your character's gear and your ability to strategize. We don't have the finer details for this mode, yet. Those will come in a blog post after season start. For now, you can read about this game mode in our When it does come out, we'll have a dedicated resource page for it and helpful tips for each class as the mode secrets reveal themselves. With the new season, a lot of excitement is waiting for us. Many of our Diablo Team members will be streaming close or at season start. Below you will find links to their stream, so you can watch and learn along with them. We hope you enjoy the Season of the Construct with the aid of our Season 3 compendium update. Our focus for the start of Season 3 is to get all our current updated with the new while we navigate new builds that reveal themselves. We're continuing to work on more updates for ! More news coming this week, stay tuned! If you haven't already, head over to our and select the to stay up to date with our content development. Written by: Contributions by: Reviewed by:
